Icandelo lenkxaso yoCwangciso loPhuhliso, imisa kakuhle kwaye ikwayiyo ekhangela indlela ekucwangciswe ngayo ngoomasipala beNtshona Koloni. ICandelo loMlawuli likwakhuthaza kwaye lisingathe ezocwangciso lwemihlaba ngokommandla nangokwephondo. Uxanduva lweli candelo lubandakanya ukugcina inkqubo ethembekileyo yengcaciso.
